title: Store Issue When Trying to Purchase RP
body: The CCV input Bar will disappear leaving no way to Purchase RP.

replies.body:
Thanks for the report! Sorry for any inconveniences. I want me some of those Blood Moon skins too! 

I have confirmed that the CVV field appearing and disappearing is currently a bug that we are working on resolving. 

_However, the field should not inhibit the actual payment process. _ The CVV appearing briefly and disappearing bug arises if your account is verified and have already a saved card on file. However, if your account is email verified and you do have a saved card on file,** you do not need to enter the CVV.**

If the field disappears, you should still be able to complete the payment. If there is any error it might reside with the actual card information.
Thanks for the report! We're investigating!

Yup, also having the same issue. 
The CCV bar will show for a second or two and then completely disappear, leaving me unable to purchase the RP without having to type all the card information again.
I know how you feel I want the Bloodmoon yasuo so bad. :(
Same, it shows up but you can't click the field and then it vanishes. I want those new Blood Moon skins but I can't get the RP!
